revised_title: The Influence of Nitrous Acid on Electromotive Force in Cells Consisting of Certain Metals, Platinum, and Nitric Acid
tldr: The authors investigate the effect of nitrous acid on the electromotive force of cells consisting of certain metals, platinum, and nitric acid. They find that the presence of nitrous acid affects the electromotive force, and they describe their experimental setup and findings in detail.
